  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El jugador audaz</string>
            <string language="en">The daring player</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der verwegene Spieler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le joueur audacieux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jogador audaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il giocatore daring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο τολμώντας φορέας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones un problema de probabilidad. Para desarrollar el problema se utiliza fundamentalmente diagramas de árbol.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve a problem in probability. The problem is studied using principally tree diagrams.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">diagrama de árbol</string>
            <string language="en">tree diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">apuesta</string>
            <string language="en">bet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regla de Laplace</string>
            <string language="en">Laplace's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">probabilidad</string>
            <string language="en">probability</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, ein Problem in der Wahrscheinlichkeit zu lösen. 
Das Problem wird mit allgemein Baumdiagrammen studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre un problème dans la probabilité. Le 
problème est étudié en utilisant principalement des diagrammes 
d'arbre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
um problema na probabilidade. O problema é estudado usando 
principalmente diagramas da árvore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere un problema nella probabilità. Il problema è 
studiato usando principalmente gli schemi dell'albero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει ένα πρόβλημα στην πιθανότητα. Το πρόβλημα 
μελετάται χρησιμοποιώντας κυρίως τα διαγράμματα δέντρων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Baumdiagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Laplaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahrscheinlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diagramme d'arbre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La loi de Laplace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">probabilité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">diagrama da árvore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aposta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lei de Laplace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">probabilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schema dell'albero</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scommessa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Legge del Laplace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">probabilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάγραμμα δέντρων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στοίχημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος Λαπλάς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πιθανότητα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
